darkhistory.electrons.ics.ics_spectrum¶

Nonrelativistic ICS spectrum after integrating over CMB.

Functions

ics_spec(eleckineng, photeng, T[, as_pairs, …]) ICS spectrum of secondary photons.
nonrel_spec(eleckineng, photeng, T[, …]) Nonrelativistic ICS spectrum of secondary photons.
nonrel_spec_diff(eleckineng, photeng, T[, …]) Nonrelativistic ICS spectrum of secondary photons by beta expansion.
nonrel_spec_quad(eleckineng_arr, photeng_arr, T) Nonrelativistic ICS spectrum of secondary photons using quadrature.
nonrel_spec_series(eleckineng, photeng, T[, …]) Nonrelativistic ICS spectrum of secondary photons by series method.
rel_spec(eleceng, photeng, T[, …]) Relativistic ICS spectrum of secondary photons.
